headline.main: Peugeot 3008 Named 'Car of the Year' at Geneva Auto Show
headline.print_headline: Peugeot 3008 Named 'Car of the Year' at Geneva Auto Show

lead_paragraph: PSA Chief Executive Carlos Tavares has told the Spanish government the firm will honor existing labor agreements at Opel's factory in Spain after buying the carmaker, Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy's office said in a statement.
